Espada - Iron Emperor Deck
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Characters: Espada - Iron Emperor Deck
By Farmer Jimbo on Wednesday, August 23, 2000 - 02:44 pm:

Espada is a very difficult opponent but notice the lack of environment cards. Play a "Lock Tight" and he is helpless!
